descriptions: ['DescriptionBetterhomes is delighted to bring to the market this lovely two bedroom apartment in the ideally located Continental Tower, Dubai Marina. The tower is\xa0close to many restaurants, supermarkets, public parks and clinics giving the elite residents all convenience living. The tower is primly\xa0located in between the marina walk and JBR beach and is only a short walk to JBR tram station making it ideal for both end users and tenants. These units are always very popular on the rental market making them ideal investments.\xa0Dubai Marina was voted one of the most popular areas in Dubai according to 2018 Bayut Real Estate. It is a fun family-oriented waterfront community which will also appeal to young professionals. The marina offers an array\xa0of popular restaurants, retail outlets located along\xa0the Persian Gulf-Fully Fitted Kitchen-High Quality of Finishes and Fittings-Best Location near to Intercontinental Hotel Dubai Marina-Direct Access to Marina Walk-50 feet away JBR Tram Station-Brand New Apartments.-Short Walk to The Beach and JBR Walk']
